About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

My name is Dana, I am 22 years old and I'm originally from Germany. I wanted to move to Finland ever since I was 14 years old. Like most of the German people who want to move to Finland, it started with the Finnish Rock/Pop band Sunrise Avenue. I've learned more about the country after I knew they were Finnish, but it developed into an individual love pretty fast.

Family life

About my family and how and where I grew up

I was born in Bremen, which is pretty much located in northern Germany. I grew up with my parents and my two brothers who are 2,5 years older and younger than me, thus I am the middle child.

Study life

What I study and plan to continue studying

After school I went to another Finnish school (Jyväskylän normaalikoulun lukio) for 4,5 months. There I decided that I wanted to try out something with Computers. I started my Digital Media studies in 2020. Right now I'm in my fifth semester of that study program and currently studying as an exchange student at LUT University in Lappeenranta.
I'm also planning to do my masters in Computer Science at some university in Finland.

Free time

About my hobbies and skills

In my free time I love to make and listen to music. I have played the guitar since I was six years old. Later I also started playing piano, clarinet and sang in a choir (and alone in my room). I also like to skate (with roller blades) and recently discovered ice skating as well. In general, I like winter sports more than other activities.
Since I've dreamt of moving to Finland for a very long time, I also enjoy learning the language.
